dublinCore.dc:title: 114 S1962 IS: To authorize 2 additional district judgeships for the district of Colorado.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Bennet (for himself and Mr. Gardner) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To authorize 2 additional district judgeships for the district of Colorado.

section.header: Additional district judgeships for the district of Colorado

subsection.text: The President shall appoint, by and with the advice and consent of the Senate, 2 additional district judges for the district of Colorado.
The table in section 133(a) of title 28, United States Code, is amended by striking the item relating to Colorado and inserting the following:
This Act, and the amendments made by this Act, shall take effect on January 21, 2017.
